disclaimerText: This forecast is intended to provide information on expected pollution levels in areas of significant public exposure. It may not apply in very specific locations close to unusually strong or short-lived local sources of pollution.

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Wednesday 25 May to end of Thursday 26 May GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Cloudy on Wednesday with light showers, brightening later. Mainly dry on Thursday with the strong winds from the Atlantic.<br/><br/>A fresh relatively 'clean' westerly or south westerly breeze will ensure good dispersion of any local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>

currentForecast.forecastSummary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Thursday 26 May to end of Friday 27 May GMT
currentForecast.forecastText: Mainly dry forecast on Thursday with cloud cover and strong winds from the Atlantic. Friday will be dry with some sunny spells. The winds will become lighter then Thursday. <br/>A fresh relatively 'clean' westerly breeze will ensure good dispersion of any local emissions.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>PM10 Particulate<br/>PM2.5 Particulate<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/><br/>
